body.name: KEEPONFIT Smart Watch, 1.8" Touch Screen Smartwatch with Alexa Built-in IP68 Waterproof, Fitness Tracker with 100+ Sports Modes Heart Rate/Blood Oxygen/Stress/Sleep Monitor for Men and Women (Black)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 6 hrs 43 mins
features: ***NOTE: 1. This watch does NOT have the Blood Pressure Monitor feature. 2. The measurement results of the watch are For Reference Only, they CANNOT be taken as the basis for the medical diagnosis. 3. The watch band length is adjustable from 6.7 inches to 9.6 inches. 4. The thickness of the watch is around 13-14 mm. 5. The watch is not suitable for use while diving, swimming in the sea, or in a sauna. It's suitable for use in swimming pools, showers (cold water) and shallows.

⌚【100+ SPORTS MODES FITNESS TRACKER】The fitness smart watch can accurately record your steps, calories, distance, heart rate and blood oxygen and detect your health status and real-time activity status. 100+ sports modes to choose such as walking, running, cycling, hiking, yoga and more. Gives you a detailed look at activities throughout the day. Helps you analyze, improve and enhance your athletic performance.

⌚【MULTIFUNCTIONAL SMART WATCH】With this Alexa built-in multifunctional smart watch, you can answer/ make calls on it when it’s connected to your phone via Bluetooth. It has functions like call/message notification previews, period reminder, sedentary and drink water reminder, music control, set alarm, find phone, check the weather and so on. Bluetooth V5.3 supported.

⌚【LARGE BATTERY CAPACITY & BATTERY LIFE】The 300mAh large battery capacity and low power consumption design offers longer endurance. Within 2.5 hours fast charging, up to 7 days of daily usage (Varies depending on actual use and other factors). This military smart watch is compatible with Android and iOS phone, but not with PC, iPad or tablet.

⌚【TOUCH SCREEN HD COLOR DISPLAY】TFT-LCD 1.8-inch large touch screen provides excellent high-definition color image quality. Switch to 120+ different screen styles with one touch, supporting upload custom pictures. Flip your wrist to automatically wake up the screen, 5 levels of the screen brightness can be set.

⌚【WATER RESISTANT & DUST PROOF】 This sport watch is perfect for outdoor enthusiasts. It is IP68 Waterproof standard and dust resistant. You can swim, surf, sail, or engage in other vigorous activities with this fitness tracker. One click to drain the water out of the smart watch. If you have any problem or suggestion, please feel free to let us know and we will try our best to help you.

Does this watch come with a charger cable? Yes, it comes in the watch box with a band and the charging cable. Can I switch languages? Yes, you can choose the language in the app. The smart watch supports English, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Japanese and Russian for now. Is it compatible with Android phones? Yes, it works for iOS and Android phones. How can I contact the seller if I have any other questions? You can send your questions to the support email, which is printed on the package. Or you can enter our store and click the button below LINGGU. We will response as fast as we can to help you. Thank you！

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ready to dial in my fitness!!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the KEEPONFIT Smart Watch and I am absolutely thrilled with its performance and features. This smartwatch has truly exceeded my expectations and has become an essential part of my daily routine.First and foremost, the 1.8" touch screen is vibrant and responsive, making navigation a breeze. The addition of Alexa built-in is a game-changer – it's incredibly convenient to have a virtual assistant right on my wrist for quick voice commands and information retrieval.The IP68 waterproof rating gives me peace of mind, allowing me to wear the smartwatch during workouts, showers, and even while swimming. The durability is impressive, and I don't have to worry about water damage.The variety of fitness tracking options is outstanding, with 100+ sports modes to choose from. Whether I'm running, cycling, or trying a new workout, the smartwatch accurately captures data, including heart rate, blood oxygen levels, stress, and sleep patterns. The insights provided by these metrics have been instrumental in optimizing my health and fitness goals.The battery life is commendable, lasting me through multiple days without needing a recharge. The convenience of not constantly worrying about charging is a significant plus for me.The sleek design of the KEEPONFIT Smart Watch makes it suitable for both men and women, and the customizable watch faces add a personal touch. The build quality is excellent, and it feels comfortable on my wrist throughout the day.In conclusion, the KEEPONFIT Smart Watch has proven to be a reliable, feature-packed device that seamlessly integrates into my lifestyle. It's a fantastic investment for anyone looking to stay on top of their fitness goals while enjoying the added benefits of a smartwatch. I wholeheartedly recommend it to both men and women seeking a versatile and high-performing smartwatch. Five stars well-deserved!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keeping an Eye on Health and Style with the KEEPONFIT Smart Watch
reviews.reviewText: In the rapidly evolving world of wearable technology, the KEEPONFIT Smart Watch stands out as a remarkable and reliable companion for anyone looking to keep a close watch on their health while staying connected and stylish. Boasting an impressive array of features including heart rate monitoring, blood oxygen measurement, Bluetooth capabilities, waterproofing, and exceptional battery life, the KEEPONFIT Smart Watch has truly earned its place as a must-have device. I received mine the same day I ordered it. If you are looking for an affordable smartwatch that has over 100 sports modes then look no further. Below is a list of features for any health enthusiast.Monitoring Your Health:One of the standout features of the KEEPONFIT Smart Watch is its comprehensive health-tracking capabilities. The device seamlessly tracks your heart rate, providing you with real-time data to ensure you're in the optimal heart rate zone during workouts or throughout your daily activities. Additionally, it measures blood oxygen levels, a crucial metric for understanding your overall well-being, particularly during workouts and sleep. These features are essential for health-conscious individuals (like me ;)) and anyone looking to keep tabs on their cardiovascular health.Stay Connected:The inclusion of Bluetooth capabilities ensures you're always connected to your smartphone. You can even receive calls and message notifications. This integration allows for a seamless and convenient lifestyle, keeping you in touch while on the go.Built to Last:The KEEPONFIT Smart Watch is designed to endure various conditions, making it the perfect companion for active individuals. Its waterproof rating ensures it can withstand water splashes, making it an excellent choice for swimmers or those who lead an active outdoor lifestyle. You won't have to worry about taking off your watch every time you wash your hands or get caught in the rain. It's built to keep up with you.Long Battery Life:A common concern with many smartwatches is their battery life. However, the KEEPONFIT Smart Watch excels in this department. With an impressive battery life, you can confidently wear it throughout the day and night, even with continuous heart rate and blood oxygen monitoring. This feature ensures that you can keep track of your health without the constant worry of recharging your device.A Stylish Statement:Apart from its impressive functionality, the KEEPONFIT Smart Watch boasts a sleek and stylish design that will complement any outfit or occasion. Its customizable watch faces and comfortable strap options allow you to match your watch to your personal style effortlessly.In my opinion, the KEEPONFIT Smart Watch combines health monitoring, connectivity, durability, and style into a single device that is truly a game-changer in the world of wearables. Whether you're an athlete striving to optimize your performance or simply wanting to stay connected and stylish, this smartwatch caters to all your needs. Its heart rate and blood oxygen monitoring, Bluetooth capabilities, waterproof design, and long-lasting battery make it an indispensable companion for everyday life. The KEEPONFIT Smart Watch is a testament to the remarkable innovations in wearable technology and an investment in your health and well-being.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this watch because I like that it looked more like a watch than just a fitness band. The price is good. I good the blue one. I thought the silver would have been metal but it not. It still looks nice. It has the man in features that I wanted. Step monitor and calorie tracking. I’m just getting use to the other features. I love the fact that you can change the watch face and personalize it. It very lightweight. I also like that it shows my emails and text messages. The big screen is great for bigger fingers. All in all, it’s definitely worth the price. One thing I didn’t expect but I do like, it syncs up to the Fitness App on IPhone. I’ve had the hardest thing using the Fitness App because I have to have the phone on me when I exercise but now with this watch, it updates the Fitness app and I can actually complete my daily goals.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars KEEPONFIT Smart Watch Great Quality and Features for a fair price
reviews.reviewText: KEEPONFIT Smart Watch has many features like the expensive brands like Apple and Fitbit. The screens can be changed and easy to navigate. Has Alexa, Heart rate monitor, Sleep monitor, Find Phone and lots of programs . I love that it receives phone calls and text messages (Blue tooth) and the speaker is very clear It appears to be very accurate and easy to learn all the features. This is a must buy and a Great valueJOE T

reviews.reviewTitle: Best watch I've used and at a reasonable price
reviews.reviewText: Excellent value for money and with more useful features than many more expensive watches. I have found its various measurements to be accurate - heart rate compared to a cuff blood pressure device. The Alexa voice is surprisingly clear considering the size of the speaker and the microphone sensitive, so you don't have to shout at the watch. Always embarrassing. I have found the strap comfortable to wear. Downsides? It is a big watch, so smaller people may not like this. However, the face is large and easy to read, so you can't really have it both ways. A second problem was pairing the watch to my phone. The app said to look for the watch's Bluetooth address, but it never appeared. What did show up was the watch name - ID Sport01 BT. But it still would not pair. I had to reset my Bluetooth on the phone and then the watch paired perfectly and has not dropped the connection. The pairing process could be easier and better explained. Apart from this niggle the watch has been one of my better purchases from Amazon.

I have use this smart watch for just over a week. Everything works as advertized. Easy to use, large watch face so it is easy to read all the data that is presented, and it all comes at a very reasonable price. Highly recommended.

This wach is basically a Fitbit on steroids. It's very stylish and full of practical health information. It will follow me on my weight loss journey. It's supported by Veryfit, a very easy to use app. I was apprehensive about the size but the supple silicone watch band makes it very comfortable to wear. Overall, I really like the watch and it's numerous features. It's a serious contender in the segment.
Lots of features. It a bit big. People tell me it as I'm not a big person. But I like it and can see the number well. And the price is perfect.
Nice watch, sounds good using the phone feature as well.Has all the gizmos I need and then some.Happy with purchase.
